plot: Darren is a business man pushed to the limit at work. One night, after another long shift, driving home with his mind elsewhere things take a turn for the worse. 1 minute is all it takes for things to go very wrong.
title: Hit/Run
plot_es: Darren is a business man pushed to the limit at work. One night, after another long shift, driving home with his mind elsewhere things take a turn for the worse. 1 minute is all it takes for things to go very wrong.
plot_en: Darren is a business man pushed to the limit at work. One night, after another long shift, driving home with his mind elsewhere things take a turn for the worse. 1 minute is all it takes for things to go very wrong.
